commit.message:
Excluding incompatible transitional dependency c3p0

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/trunk@1442506 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:

@@ -624,13 +626,29 @@ under the License.
